name: @pablozaiden/compass
description: Console tool to benchmark coding agents across prompts and fixtures.
author: Pablo Zaidenvoren

scripts.compile: export workspace_dir=$(pwd); export build_output=$(mktemp); bun install; (cd /tmp; bun build --compile --outfile=$build_output $workspace_dir/src/index.ts; mkdir -p $workspace_dir/out; mv $build_output $workspace_dir/out/compass)
scripts.compile:all: export workspace_dir=$(pwd); mkdir -p $workspace_dir/out; for target_os in linux darwin; do for target_arch in x64 arm64; do bun install --cpu=$target_arch --os=$target_os; export build_output=$(mktemp); (cd /tmp; bun build --compile --outfile=$build_output $workspace_dir/src/index.ts --target bun-$target_os-$target_arch); mv $build_output $workspace_dir/out/compass-$target_os-$target_arch; done; done
